name: Pico Pirates (Craig Tinney)
description:
Pico Pirates is an open world adventure game featuring deadly monsters, rival pirates and beautiful sandy beaches!

You set out on your quest to find The Pirate King and claim the crown for yourself. To do this, you'll need to fid the 4 compass peices  scattered around the vast, procedurally generated worldand keep your crews spirits high throughout (pirates lovely treasure and a good fight!).

________________________________________________________________________________________

Pico Pirates is also available on the lexaloffle forums. If you'd like to view the full,  uncompressed source code, you can find it on this page for a small fee.

If you come across any issues or have any thoughts on your experience with this game, I'd love to hear from you! 

Good luck!

________________________________________________________________________________________

Art, programming, design

Craig Tinney

Music

Chris Donnelly
aka Gruber_music

Special thanks

Daniel Caaz for their excellent font compression solution
Josh Richter for their excellent ideas and constant testing
Alex Wall <3
